question: [Brief] Turkce: Cizilen dogru icin the slope of the noisy line belirt.

qas.question: [Brief] Turkce: Cizilen dogru icin the slope of the noisy line belirt.
[Calm] Polski: Okresl the intercept of the noisy line dla narysowanej prostej.
[Focus] Norsk: Oppgi the value of y when x equals 1 for linjen som vises.
